title: EU examines Microsoft investment in OpenAI
text: "We are inviting businesses and experts to tell us about any competition issues that they may perceive in these industries, whilst also closely monitoring AI partnerships to ensure they do not unduly distort market dynamics," she said. The  online store was set to launch in November last year but got delayed amid the intense drama over OpenAI CEO Sam Altman's firing and rehiring. OpenAI plans to launch a store for GPTs, custom apps based on its text-generating AI models, according to a report in The Verge. The store is expected to be operational next week.
